#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
vector <pair <int,int> > vp;
#define mp(x,y) make_pair(x,y)
vector <int> v;
void input()
{
    int x;
    for(int j = 1; j <= 10; j++) {
        v.clear();
        for(int i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
            scanf("%d", &x);
            v.push_back(x);
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        int p = (v[(v.size()-1)] - v[0]);
        vp.push_back(mp(p,j));
    }
    sort(vp.begin(),vp.end());
    /*for(int l=0; l < vp.size(); l++) {
        cout << " vp-->>f " << vp[l].first << " vp-->>s " << vp[l].second << endl;
    }*/
    int ans1 = vp[0].second;
    int ans2 = vp[0].first;
    for(int k = 1; k < vp.size(); k++) {
        if(vp[k-1].first == vp[k].first ) {
            ans1 =  vp[k].second;
            ans2 = vp[k].first;
        }
        else break;
    }
    printf("%d %d\n",ans1,ans2);
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--) {
        vp.clear();
        input();
    }
    return 0;
}
